title: Area of amenities and facilities to be provided as per Annexure-A shall be inclusive of reservations in sanctioned DP
clause_text: Area of amenities and facilities to be provided as per Annexure-A shall be inclusive of reservations in sanctioned DP. Types of reservations and area of reservations shall in no case be reduced

source_pdf.text_snippet: Area of amenities and facilities to be provided as per Annexure-A shall be inclusive of reservations in sanctioned DP. Types of reservations and area of reservations shall in no case be reduced
